equipment.detail_1: Phantom 4 RTK is an advanced drone for surveying and mapping, integrating centimeter-accurate RTK. With a 20MP camera and 30-minute flight time, it provides high-quality data for engineering and construction projects.
equipment.detail_2: Phantom 4 Pro is a high-end drone with a 20MP camera, 1-inch CMOS sensor and up to 30 minutes of flight time. It provides outstanding image and video quality, ideal for professional photography and videography.
equipment.detail_3: Mavic 3 Thermal is a multi-purpose drone with a thermal camera and 4/3 CMOS sensor. It provides accurate thermal imaging and a flight time of up to 46 minutes, ideal for rescue, surveillance and infrastructure inspection applications.
equipment.title: EQUIPMENT OF

quotes.mes: Let us know how we can help you.
quotes.term: IdeasDrone may use your information to contact you about our products or services, you can unsubscribe from these communications at any time.
quotes.title: Book a consultation with us

services.detail_1: We carry out surveys and create accurate and detailed smart maps, providing useful information about the terrain and environment.
services.detail_2: We use advanced technology to create high-quality 3D models, helping you better understand the space and structure of projects.
services.detail_3: We provide in-depth structural inspection services, helping you ensure the safety and quality of construction projects.
services.detail_4: We perform detailed environmental analyzes to assess the impact of man-made and natural activities on the surrounding environment.
services.detail_5: We provide training and consulting services to businesses on the use of UAV technology and applications in their business operations.
services.detail_6: We offer digital geodetic data storage and display services, accessible on any platform, at any time, and from anywhere.
services.sub_title_6: DIGITAL DATA STORAGE AND DISPLAY PLATFORM
services.title: SERVICES OF
